subject: Harness Racing
Horse Racing
Breeding of Animals
Horses
lead_paragraph: To stem the loss of its best horses to breeding, the harness racing industry may bar competitors sired by a horse who was 4 years old or younger at the time of conception.
snippet: To stem the loss of its best horses to breeding, the harness racing industry may bar competitors sired by a horse who was 4 years old or younger at the time of conception.
